column4: I'm trying to install 9.10 with auto|manual ext3|ext4 partitions from the live CD and each time with each combination I get the error "The attempt to mount a file system with type ext3|ext4 ... at / failed." Anybody have any ideas why?
I'm aware it's beta, was just wanting to try it out
this is not the place to ask about it #ubuntu+1 for that
